cityPlacesTopics.title: Queens Park
cityPlacesTopics.paragraph: Lush green space with vibrant gardens, serene lake, and an array of attractions including a mini zoo, aviary, and historic bandstand. Ideal for leisurely walks and family outings.

cityPlacesTopics.paragraph: Historical hardware store displaying an array of classic motorcycles and Burt Munro memorabilia, complemented by a cosy coffee shop and unique motorcycling souvenirs.
